detectors.description:
DIFI.mint(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DIFI.sol#81-89) contains a tautology or contradiction:
	- require(bool)(balances[msg.sender] >= _amount && _amount >= 0) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DIFI.sol#85)

DIFI.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DIFI.sol#134-140) contains a tautology or contradiction:
	- require(bool)(finalBalance >= _amount && _amount >= 0) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DIFI.sol#136)

DIFI.mint(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DIFI.sol#81-89) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_totalsupply > (SafeMath.add(_premined,_mined))) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DIFI.sol#83)
	- require(bool)(mintingTime[_customerAddress] == 0) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DIFI.sol#84)
	- require(bool)(balances[msg.sender] >= _amount && _amount >= 0) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DIFI.sol#85)
detectors.markdown:
[DIFI.mint(uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DIFI.sol#L81-L89) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- [require(bool)(_totalsupply > (SafeMath.add(_premined,_mined)))](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DIFI.sol#L83)
	- [require(bool)(mintingTime[_customerAddress] == 0)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DIFI.sol#L84)
	- [require(bool)(balances[msg.sender] >= _amount && _amount >= 0)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DIFI.sol#L85)
